attributes.additional_details: Get school to treat it like a normal thing such as religion, beliefs or even race.
attributes.background: Help us ban lgbtq lessons in form in high school because kids get easily put into situations where they are pressured to either speak about there issues and what they support about lgbtq.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646173
